workspace.name: 1e-query-harmonized-mlw17
workspace.query:
xquery version "1.0-ml"; (: :Show me any customer records having a shipping-zip equal to 36628 : : Select : From Documents (The database) : Where customer.canonical.shipping-zip = 36628 :)
/customer[canonical/shipping-zip eq "36628"]

xquery version "1.0-ml"; (: Search with REST : : Show me any customer records containing the text 'alabama' :)
xdmp:http-get(fn:concat("http://localhost:8000/v1/search?q=alabama"), <options xmlns="xdmp:http"> <authentication> <username>admin</username> <password>admin</password> </authentication> </options>)
(: Change alabama to 36628, then texas, view results :)

xquery version "1.0-ml"; (: Return a document/entity with REST :)
xdmp:http-get(fn:concat("http://localhost:8000/v1/documents?uri=/denormalized/customer-1.xml"), <options xmlns="xdmp:http"> <authentication> <username>admin</username> <password>admin</password> </authentication> </options>)
" This workspace demonstrates searching and querying our harmonized documents. In addition, we start to explore querying our data via the REST API. "

xquery version "1.0-ml"; (: Use this tab to reinsert customer entities into the DB as they : were at the end of workspace 1c, prior to starting this workspace, : as well as the orders and products.) :)
let $cust-a-records := <dataset> <customer> <metadata> <source>POS</source> <date>2017-05-09-04:00</date> <lineage>v01 transform</lineage> </metadata> <canonical> <shipping-zip>36628</shipping-zip> let $cust-a-docs := $cust-a-records/customer let $count := fn:count($cust-a-docs) let $cust-a-reset := for $d at $idx in $cust-a-docs let $uri := fn:concat("/denormalized/customer-",$idx,".xml") return xdmp:document-insert($uri, <customer>{$d/node()}</customer>, (), ("customer", "system-a", "enveloped", "harmonized"))

let $cust-b-docs := $cust-b-records/customer let $count := fn:count($cust-b-docs) let $cust-b-reset := for $d at $idx in $cust-b-docs let $uri := fn:concat("/customer-",$idx,".xml") return xdmp:document-insert($uri, <customer>{$d/node()}</customer>, (), ("customer", "system-b", "enveloped", "harmonized"))
let $order-records := <dataset> <record> <id>1</id> <order_date>2016-06-20</order_date> <ship_date>2016-06-25 06:09:29 UTC</ship_date> <customer_id>3</customer_id> <payment_terms>COD</payment_terms> <order_lines> <order_line> <product>4</product> <quantity>88</quantity> <unit_price>37.26</unit_price> <discount>0.02</discount> <total>65.58</total> <notes>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Vivamus in felis eu sapien cursus vestibulum. Proin eu mi. Nulla ac enim. In tempor, turpis nec euismod scelerisque, quam turpis adipiscing lorem, vitae mattis nibh ligula nec sem. Duis aliquam convallis nunc. Proin at turpis a pede posuere nonummy. Integer non velit. Integer non velit.</notes> </order_line> </order_lines> <notes/> <status>new</status> </record> <record> <id>3</id> <order_date>2016-04-04</order_date> <ship_date>2016-04-09 07:04:23 UTC</ship_date> <customer_id>3</customer_id> <payment_terms>PIA</payment_terms> <order_lines> <order_line> <product>4</product> <quantity>32</quantity> <unit_price>12.22</unit_price> <discount>0.33</discount> <total>129.04</total> <notes>Fusce lacus purus, aliquet at, feugiat non, pretium quis, lectus. Curabitur gravida nisi at nibh.</notes> </order_line> <order_line> <product>5</product> <quantity>98</quantity> <unit_price>57.53</unit_price> <discount>0.04</discount> <total>225.52</total> <notes/> </order_line> <order_line> <product>2</product> <quantity>87</quantity> <unit_price>59.81</unit_price> <discount>0.89</discount> <total>4631.09</total> <notes/> </order_line> </order_lines> <notes/> <status>in progress</status> </record> </dataset> let $orders := $order-records/record let $count := fn:count($orders) let $order-reset := for $d at $idx in $orders let $uri := fn:concat("/order-",$idx,".xml") return xdmp:document-insert($uri, <order>{$d/node()}</order>, (), "order")

let $prod-docs := $product-doc/record let $count := fn:count($prod-docs) let $prod-doc-reset := for $d at $idx in $prod-docs let $uri := fn:concat("/product-",$idx,".xml") return xdmp:document-insert($uri, <product>{$d/node()}</product>, (), "product")
return ($cust-a-reset, $cust-b-reset, $prod-doc-reset, $order-reset), "You've just loaded the following into the Documents DB: - the enveloped and harmonized system-a and system-b customer records - order documents - product documents "
